body:
Reinhart, Christoph wrote:


One caveat: rvu is not included in those binaries (the download link
states non-graphical tools only), and the older rview will choke on any
octrees created with newer versions of oconv, regardless of whether the
file contains any of the newer entities (like meshes).

- Rob
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] import from Ecotect to Radiance
subject: [Radiance-general] import from Ecotect to Radiance
